item.title: Firefly Aerospace 将为美国首次公开募股定价，以实现积极的升空目标
item.description: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）支持的萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）是一家热闹非凡的太空技术初创公司，曾将着陆器送上月球。【原文：Northrop Grumman-backed Firefly Aerospace, the buzzy space technology startup that put a lander on the moon, is set to price its U.S. IPO later on Wednesday.】

item.title: Mckesson 因特药需求强劲而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 美国药品分销商麦克森公司（McKesson）周三上调了年度利润预期，并超过了华尔街的盈利预期，这主要得益于对特殊药品的强劲需求。【原文：U.S. drug distributor McKesson raised its annual profit forecast and beat Wall Street earnings estimates on Wednesday, banking on robust demand for specialty medicines.】

item.title: 受贸易不确定性影响，Fortinet 预计第三季度销售额低于预期
item.description: Fortinet 周三预测第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，原因是全球贸易紧张局势引发的宏观经济不确定性普遍存在，企业削减了开支，导致股价在盘后交易中下跌 12%。【原文：Fortinet forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as businesses cut back on spending amid widespread macroeconomic uncertainty stemming from global trade tensions, sending shares down 12% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国加征关税前夕，巴西 7 月牛肉出口创历史新高
item.description: 周三的贸易数据显示，7月份巴西新鲜牛肉的出口量达到创纪录的27.69万吨，这表明在美国对这个全球最大出口国的销售征收巨额关税之前，巴西牛肉的出口量急剧上升。【原文：Exports of fresh beef from Brazil reached a record 276,900 metric tons in July, according to trade data on Wednesday, showing a steep rise before a hefty U.S. tariff applied on sales from the world's biggest exporter.】

item.title: 顶级钾肥生产商 Nutrien 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 本周三，Nutrien 公司的第二季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家世界顶级的钾肥生产商受益于北美玉米种植季节的强劲需求。【原文：Nutrien beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the world's top potash producer benefited from improved demand in North America amid a robust corn planting season.】

item.title: 交易日：华尔街势头平息关税震荡
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 保诚金融公司在美国联邦贸易委员会和解协议中支付 1 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会与保德信金融公司达成了一项 1 亿美元的和解协议，以解决前部门误导消费者购买未提供其所承诺保险的医疗保健计划的指控。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission reached a $100 million settlement with Prudential Financial to resolve claims a former unit misled consumers into buying healthcare plans that did not provide the coverage it promised.】

item.title: 科培公司因支出恢复而公布季度利润增加
item.description: 商业支付公司 Corpay 周三公布，受企业和车辆支付部门增长的推动，第二季度利润有所增长。【原文：Business payments firm Corpay reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by growth in its corporate and vehicle payment divisions.】

item.title: 苹果公司承诺向美国追加 1,000 亿美元投资
item.description: 苹果公司周三表示，它将在美国追加 1,000 亿美元的投资，使其在未来四年对美国的总投资承诺达到 6,000 亿美元。【原文：Apple said on Wednesday it would spend an additional $100 billion in U.S. investments, bringing its total investment commitment to the country to $600 billion over the next four years.】

item.title: 因人工智能需求驱动，Paycom 上调 2025 年收入和利润预期
item.description: 薪资处理商 Paycom Software 周三上调了年度收入和利润预期，因为人工智能功能的增加有助于加快员工管理服务的需求，这使得其股价在延时交易中上涨了 7%。【原文：Payroll processor Paycom Software raised its forecast for annual revenue and profit on Wednesday, as the addition of AI features helps accelerate demand for its employee management services, sending its shares up 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普会见花旗集团和美国银行首席执行官讨论房利美和房地美问题
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的消息人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三在白宫会见了花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽，讨论了政府对房利美和房地美的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump met Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser at the White House on Wednesday to discuss the administration's plans for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, according to a source familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Elf Beauty 因平价口红和护肤品需求强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）周三公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出预期，主要原因是尽管零售业普遍放缓，但零售商和网络渠道对其价格低廉的产品（包括唇油和腮红）的需求依然强劲。【原文：Elf Beauty beat first-quarter sales and profit estimates on Wednesday, fueled by resilient demand for its affordable products including lip oils and blush tints at retailers and online channels, despite broader retail slowdown.】

item.title: 保险公司美国国际集团（AIG）承保实力增强，季度利润增加
item.description: 美国国际集团（American International Group）周三公布第二季度利润增长，主要得益于强劲的承保收益和较高的投资回报率。【原文：American International Group reported a higher second-quarter profit on Wednesday, powered by strong underwriting gains and higher returns on investments.】

item.title: 戴利表示，美联储可能需要在未来几个月内降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周三以劳动力市场放缓和她认为关税仅对通胀构成短期威胁为由表示，她认为美国央行不久将需要降息。【原文：Citing a slowing labor market and her assessment that tariffs pose only a short-term threat to inflation, San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Wednesday said she believes the U.S. central bank will need to cut interest rates soon.】

item.title: Doordash预计本季度业绩强劲，快递需求保持稳定
item.description: 本周三，Doordash 预测第三季度商品总值将高于华尔街预期，此前该公司的预测高于预期，并押注于通过其平台进行食品和杂货配送的强劲需求。【原文：Doordash forecast third-quarter gross merchandise value above Wall Street expectations after topping estimates on Wednesday, betting on robust demand for food and grocery deliveries through its platform.】

item.title: Bumble 第二季度营收超出预期，任命新首席财务官
item.description: Bumble 周三公布的第二季度营收高于华尔街预期，这款约会应用的扭亏为盈初见成效。【原文：Bumble on Wednesday posted second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates, as the dating app begins to bear early fruits from its turnaround efforts.】

item.title: Lyft 季度营收不及预期，原因是竞争激烈、美国出行需求疲软
item.description: 受优步（Uber）竞争加剧和美国出行需求疲软的影响，Lyft 周三未能达到第二季度营收预期，盘后交易中股价下跌 7%。【原文：Lyft missed second-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday, pressured by mounting competition from Uber and softening U.S. travel demand, sending its shares down 7% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: Airbnb 预计第三季度营收高于预期，计划回购 60 亿美元股票
item.description: Airbnb 周三预测第三季度营收高于华尔街预期，并宣布了一项价值 60 亿美元的新股回购计划，使这家度假租赁公司的股价在收盘后上涨了 3.4%。【原文：Airbnb forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday and announced a new share repurchase program worth $6 billion, sending the vacation rentals company's shares up 3.4% after the bell.】

item.title: 人工智能工具提高用户参与度，Duolingo 上调 2025 年收入预期
item.description: 语言学习应用 Duolingo 周三上调了全年营收预期，第二季度营收超过预期，预计其人工智能增强型订阅层级将在全球用户群中得到更广泛的应用。【原文：Language-learning app Duolingo raised its annual revenue forecast and beat second-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday, anticipating broader adoption of its AI-enhanced subscription tier among its global user base.】

item.title: 曼哈顿地标摩天大楼业主完成 13 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据代表开发商的律师事务所 Rosenberg + Estis 称，纽约市房地产开发商 The Durst Organization 周三为时代广场地标性摩天大楼签署了 2025 年曼哈顿最大的写字楼贷款之一。【原文：New York City property developer The Durst Organization sealed one of 2025's largest Manhattan office loans for a landmark Times Square skyscraper on Wednesday, according to Rosenberg + Estis, the law firm that represented the developer.】

item.title: 阿波罗收购 Stream 数据中心，押注人工智能基础设施热潮
item.description: 另类资产管理公司阿波罗（Apollo）周三表示，同意收购 Stream Data Centers（SDC）的多数股权，押注人工智能和云计算推动的数字基础设施需求增长。【原文：Apollo agreed to buy a majority interest in Stream Data Centers (SDC), the alternative asset manager said on Wednesday, in a bet on rising demand for digital infrastructure fueled by artificial intelligence and cloud computing.】

item.title: 独家报道：卢拉计划为战略矿产制定新的 "国家主权 "政策
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周三告诉路透社，他计划制定一项新的国家政策，将战略性矿产视为 "国家主权 "问题，以避免出口矿产而不增加当地价值。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva told Reuters on Wednesday of his plans for a new national policy treating strategic minerals as a matter of "national sovereignty" in order to avoid exporting minerals without adding value locally.】

item.title: 印美在贸易和石油问题上的争执有可能造成更广泛的影响
item.description: 分析家和官员们说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在贸易和俄罗斯石油采购问题上对印度的抨击有可能使印度二十年来取得的外交进展付诸东流，而且由于国内政治压力促使双方立场趋于强硬，印度的其他合作领域也可能因此脱轨。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tirade against India over trade and Russian oil purchases threatens to undo two decades of diplomatic progress, analysts and officials say, and could derail other areas of cooperation as domestic political pressures drive both sides to harden their stances.】

item.title: 美联储库克称 7 月就业数据不温不火值得关注
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周三表示，上周五公布的 7 月份招聘数据在放缓招聘步伐方面 "令人担忧"。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said on Wednesday that July hiring data released last Friday was “concerning” in the moderation of the pace of hiring.】

item.title: 独家报道卢拉拒绝就美巴关税问题致电特朗普的 "羞辱 "行为
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦接受路透社采访，谈论关税问题。【原文：Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva sat down with Reuters to talk tariffs.】

item.title: 卡什卡利美联储需要应对经济放缓，今年两次降息是合理的
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周三表示，尽管关税是否会继续推高通胀率仍不明确，但美国联邦储备委员会近期可能需要降息，以应对美国经济放缓。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve may need to cut interest rates in the near term in response to a slowing U.S. economy, even though it remains unclear whether tariffs will continue to push inflation higher, Minneapolis Fed President Neel Kashkari said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会寻求阻止爱德华生命科学公司收购 JenaValve 公司
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会起诉爱德华兹生命科学公司（Edwards Lifesciences Corp），要求阻止该公司收购杰纳活瓣技术公司（JenaValve Technology Inc）。美国联邦贸易委员会周三在华盛顿提起诉讼，称这一并购将减少一种用于治疗潜在致命心脏病的设备的市场竞争。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission sued to block Edwards Lifesciences Corp's acquisition of JenaValve Technology Inc, saying in a lawsuit filed in Washington on Wednesday the merger would decrease competition in the market for a device meant to treat a potentially fatal heart condition.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普下达降低欧盟汽车关税的命令尚需时日
item.description: 一位熟悉欧盟与美国谈判的消息人士称，欧盟很可能还要再等几天，才能等到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下达降低欧洲汽车和汽车零部件进口关税的行政命令。【原文：The European Union will likely have to wait a few more days for an executive order by U.S. President Donald Trump lowering tariffs on imports of European cars and car parts, a source familiar with the EU-U.S. negotiations said.】

item.title: 美国为自动驾驶汽车 Zoox 发放豁免，结束调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，它已对亚马逊公司的自动驾驶汽车 Zoox 进行了示范使用认证，并结束了对其是否符合联邦要求的调查。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Wednesday it has certified Amazon.com's self-driving unit Zoox vehicles for demonstration use and closed a probe into whether they had complied with federal requirements.】

item.title: 谷歌承诺出资 10 亿美元在美国大学进行人工智能培训
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）周三宣布了一项为期三年、价值 10 亿美元的承诺，将为美国高等教育机构和非营利组织提供人工智能培训和工具。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Wednesday announced a three-year, $1 billion commitment to provide artificial intelligence training and tools to U.S. higher education institutions and nonprofits.】
